### Visit docs: https://github.com/oobianom/r2resize

# Install and Use

```{r,eval=FALSE}
install.packages(r2resize)
library(r2resize)
```

# Theme setting

```{r,echo=TRUE}
r2resize::add.resizer(
  theme.color = "black",
  position = "top",
  font.size = "12px",
  font.color = "black",
  tables = TRUE,
  images = TRUE,
  line.color = "orange",
  line.height = 5,
  line.width = 200
)

```
